title: Relates to the development of a model pesticide policy
summary: Relates to the development of a model pesticide policy.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2210

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  ZEBROWSKI  --  read once and referred to the
         Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation  to  the
         development of a model pesticide policy

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 33-0303 of the environmental  conservation  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new subdivision 8 to read as follows:
    3    8.  THE  COMMISSIONER, IN CONSULTATION WITH THE COMMISSIONER OF EDUCA-
    4  TION AND THE COMMISSIONER OF HEALTH, SHALL  DEVELOP  A  MODEL  PESTICIDE
    5  POLICY.  SUCH POLICY SHALL INCLUDE RECOMMENDATIONS FOR PHYSICAL, BIOLOG-
    6  ICAL AND MECHANICAL CONTROL METHODS AS WELL AS INTEGRATED  PEST  MANAGE-
    7  MENT TECHNIQUES.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
    9  it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00746-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the development of a model pesticide policy
